summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the West Seattle Junction Hub Urban Village Neighborhood Plan; amending the Seattle Comprehensive Plan to incorporate portions of the West Seattle Junction Hub Urban Village Neighborhood Plan; amending the Official Land Use Map, Title 23 of the Seattle Municipal Code, to reflect the boundaries of the West Seattle Junction Hub Urban Village; and amending Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 23.47, relating to single purpose residential development.
committee: Neighborhoods, Growth Planning and Civic Engagement
